titleStmt.title: Proposals for raising a thousand pounds
titleStmt.author: Povey, Charles, 1652?-1743.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed by Henry Hills in Black-Fryers, near the Water-side,

notesStmt.note: Attribution from first line of text.
Place of publication and printer's name from colophon; date of publication from DNB.
Identified as Wing (2nd ed.) P3740 on UMI microfilm set "Early English books, 1641-1700", reel 2124.2.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
